Summary: Brightest light in sky; hovers, seen in southwestern sky; moves very slow.
divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i first spotted this bright light driving home from a friends house on 1\3\09, we followed it for 30 miles, it never moved. it was the brightest thing it the sky. we have seen it over a dozen times since located in the south western sky from our home. it is lower than most of the stars and much brighter. when planes go by, it makes this look very big in comparison. it moves very slow. last night 1\23 for the first time, we saw it in the southern skies. at times, when it is closer, you can see red and green lights around the bright white light in the center. it is not a plane or a star. one night it was directly above our house, it looked huge,you could see the green and red lights very well. we continue to try and get a picture but no luck.
